messages.message:
Regarding testing this revert:
 0.   post-revert, checked in Crafting that classification works fine.
1. for testing the original issue, Cypress tests should run successfully - added to run as pre-merge checks, though they seem to get skipped - how do I trigger them explicitly? (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/actions/runs/12758722549?pr=66948) 
2. for testing an old app, previous instructions might not apply to the new crafting template that has its own db: https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05EQQJGN7L/p1720634449299679?thread_ts=1720630631.397669&cid=C05EQQJGN7L How can I test this with an empty db? will try to switch into Dogfood as a first step.

for 1, our documentation chatbot offers no help :stuck_out_tongue_winking_eye: and seems rather tricky to setup yet another crafting sandbox for the cypress tests (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05L87V014J/p1736802879474139), so would prefer not to overspend time for testing such a simple one-line change.
does #0 (from your list above) cover the first bullet? For the second bullet, yea pointing to the dogfood db is a good idea. Or you can use this ibflowbin I downloaded from aihub-sandbox

@lydia your first bullet testing via Crafting for the affected file :slightly_smiling_face:
second bullet tested with ibflowbin by logging in as admin on Crafting and running the flow successfully:
